name: Be a pong
description:
Everyone
Believes themselves
They are the best Beer Pong Player

IN THE WORLD

Are you ready to be the Beer Pong champion?
Challenge your Beer Pong skills!
Make trick shots and be the party king!

» Simply drag to shoot the ball
» Hundreds of stages to play
» Challenging trick shots
» Share trick shot replays with your friends
» Supports iPhoneX, iPad series
